text:
Adam Schiff is arguing that CV victims are victims of the failed impeachment of @POTUS.

No one should be surprised by this bec he told us it would happen in his argument at the impeachment trial!

They were plotting future investig b4 the sham was over.🙄 https://t.co/LbqqQuvlkk
